entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 p.m. NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 5:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 48 %
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: SSW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming east 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to drizzle and ending near noon then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Windy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
